channel.title: !staff spot for help!
channel.description: hey guys im andrew and im give head admin for someone to test my new server out like the client skilling pking with me to make sure it all works and no glitchs r there or dups so if u would like to have this spot just leave a comment and ill get back to u asap ill be on all day checking for comments if wanted ill be on msn to msn is (andrewhobby_lol@hotmail.com)

item.title: !staff spot for help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

These threads are not allowed. If you want to advertise your server, use the Server Status Page (while you didnâ€™t tell us the address, your intentions are still to bring people to your server).

You will get much more feedback from players via the server status page, than asking people in the help section, from which 1-2 people may actually connect.

Read full topic
